jltl2dstar

Class DRAOptimizations

  • java.lang.Object
    • jltl2dstar.DRAOptimizations

  • public class DRAOptimizations
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides optimizations on complete DRAs, notably quotienting using bisimulation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DRAOptimizations.AcceptanceSignature
      Type of an acceptance signature
      static class  DRAOptimizations.AcceptanceSignatureComparator
      Functor that compares two DRA states based on their acceptance signature.
      static class  DRAOptimizations.AcceptanceSignatureContainer
      A container that stores (caches) the acceptance signatures of all the states in a DRA.
      static class  DRAOptimizations.ColoredStateComparator
      Functor, provides a 'less-than' Comparator for the states of the DRA, using the color of the states themself and the colors of the to-states of the edges.
      static class  DRAOptimizations.Coloring
      Helper class, storing a coloring of the states

      • optimizeBisimulation

        public DRA optimizeBisimulation(DRA dra,
                                boolean printColoring,
                                boolean detailedStates,
                                boolean printStats)
                         throws PrismException
        Perform quotienting using bisimulation
        Parameters:
        dra - the DRA to be optimized
        printColoring - print colorings on std::cerr? (default: false)
        detailedStates - save detailed information on the interals in the state? (default: false)
        printStats - print statistics on std::cerr? (default: false)
        Returns:
        shared_ptr to the quotiented DRA
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • generateColoring

        private <T extends java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Integer>> DRAOptimizations.Coloring generateColoring(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> states,
                                                                                                       DRAOptimizations.Coloring coloring,
                                                                                                       T comp)
        Generate a new coloring based on the Comparator comp (one iteration of refinement)
        Parameters:
        states - A vector of the states
        coloring - The current coloring
        comp - the Comparator
        Returns:
        a pointer to a newly created Coloring, memory ownership passes to the caller
